weekly picks (Jul 1 week 2022)

Posted on June 27, 2022 in 2022jul 

A WordCloud of 2022 Jul 1st week collection

  1. 2206.14210 Breakdown of heavy quasiparticles in a honeycomb Kondo lattice: a quantum Monte Carlo study (arXiv)

  2. PhysRevX.12.021068 Resonant Inelastic X-Ray Scattering Study of Electron-Exciton Coupling in High-${T}_{c}$ Cuprates (PRX)

  3. PhysRevB.105.214438 Enhancement of spin-mixing conductance by $s\text{\ensuremath{-}}d$ orbital hybridization in heavy metals (PRB)

  4. PhysRevB.105.245153 Trigonal symmetry breaking and its electronic effects in the two-dimensional dihalides $M{X}{2}$ and trihalides $M{X}{3}$ (PRB)

  5. PhysRevB.105.214437 Commensuration effects on skyrmion Hall angle and drag for manipulation of skyrmions on two-dimensional periodic substrates (PRB)

  6. PhysRevB.105.224425 Understanding the $sp$ magnetism in substitutional doped graphene (PRB)

  7. PhysRevB.105.245150 Persistence of correlation-driven surface states in ${\mathrm{SmB}}_{6}$ under pressure (SBSeo, PRB)

  8. PhysRevX.12.021067 Interaction-Driven Metal-Insulator Transition with Charge Fractionalization (CenkeXu, PRX)

  9. PhysRevLett.129.017201 Low-Energy Excitations of Skyrmion Crystals in a Centrosymmetric Kondo-Lattice Magnet: Decoupled Spin-Charge Excitations and Nonreciprocity (Mochizuki, PRL)

  10. PhysRevB.105.235142 Orbital angular momentum driven anomalous Hall effect (OAM Bahramy, PRB)

  11. PhysRevB.105.214525 Dispersive one-dimensional Majorana modes with emergent supersymmetry in one-dimensional proximitized superconductors via spatially modulated potentials and magnetic fields (PRB)

  12. PhysRevB.105.214310 Off-diagonal electron-phonon coupling effects on two-level system dynamics (PRB)

  13. PhysRevB.105.224423 Skyrmion crystal under ${D}_{3h}$ point group: Role of out-of-plane Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction (Hayami, PRB)

  14. PhysRevB.105.224424 Route towards stable homochiral topological textures in $A$-type antiferromagnets (PRB)

  15. PhysRevB.105.235204 Chiral phonons entangled with multiple Hall effects and unified convention for pseudoangular momentum in two-dimensional materials (SMurakami, PRB)

  16. PhysRevB.105.235307 Van Hove singularity and Lifshitz transition in thickness-controlled Li-intercalated graphene (Li-Graphene, PRB)

  17. 2206.13537 One-dimensional topological superconductivity based entirely on phase control (arXiv.org)

  18. 2206.13682 Quantum geometric effect on Fulde-Ferrell-Larkin-Ovchinnikov superconductivity (Yanase, arXiv.org)

  19. 2206.14108 Trapped magnetic flux in hydrogen-rich high-temperature superconductors (arXiv.org)

  20. 2206.13484 Quantum interference in a superconductor-${\mathrm{MnBi}}{2}{\mathrm{Te}}{4}$-superconductor Josephson junction (arXiv.org)

  21. 2206.13567 Excitonic Chern insulator and kinetic ferromagnetism in MoTe$_2$/WSe$_2$ moir\‘e bilayer (arXiv.org)

  22. 2206.13699 Magnetic molecular orbitals in MnSi (MnSi, arXiv.org)

  23. 2206.13826 Suppressed fluctuation as the origin of the static order in strained Sr2RuO4 (arXiv.org)

  24. 2206.14028 Fractons: gauging spin models and tensor gauge theory (arXiv.org)

  25. 2206.14101 Overlap of parafermionic zero modes at a finite distance (arXiv.org)

  26. 2206.12427 Nematic excitonic insulator in transition metal dichalcogenide moir\‘e heterobilayers (DasSarma, arXiv.org)

  27. 2206.13118 Field-Induced Magnetic States in the Metallic Rare-Earth Layered Triangular Antiferromagnet TbAuAl$_4$Ge$_2$ (MHLee, arXiv.org)

  28. 2206.13501 Topological and stacked flat bands in bilayer graphene with a superlattice potential (Cano, arXiv.org)

  29. PhysRevB.105.235138 Topological classification and diagnosis in magnetically ordered electronic materials (PRB)

  30. PhysRevB.105.235136 Unsupervised learning of interacting topological and symmetry-breaking phase transitions (PRB)

  31. PhysRevB.105.235141 Fluctuating spin-orbital texture of Rashba-split surface states in real and reciprocal space (PRB)

  32. PhysRevB.105.224316 Effects of critical correlations on quantum percolation in two dimensions (Ising, PRB)

  33. PhysRevB.105.235139 Topological states in a dimerized system with staggered magnetic fluxes (PRB)

  34. PhysRevB.105.245140 Cu doping effects on the electronic structure of ${\mathrm{Fe}}{1\ensuremath{-}x}{\mathrm{Cu}}{x}\mathrm{Se}$ (PRB)

  35. PhysRevB.105.L241411 Valley polarization transition in a two-dimensional electron gas (SJAhn, PRB)

  36. PhysRevB.105.214111 Critical exponents of the Ising model in three dimensions with long-range power-law correlated site disorder: A Monte Carlo study (Ising, PRB)

  37. PhysRevB.105.214433 Ground state of the $S=\frac{1}{2}$ triangular lattice Heisenberg-like antiferromagnet ${\mathrm{Ba}}{3}{\mathrm{CoSb}}{2}{\mathrm{O}}_{9}$ in an out-of-plane magnetic field (triangular, PRB)

  38. PhysRevB.105.224113 Crystal symmetry of stripe-ordered ${\mathrm{La}}{1.88}{\mathrm{Sr}}{0.12}{\mathrm{CuO}}_{4}$ (PRB)

  39. PhysRevB.105.224514 Van Hove singularity induced phonon-mediated superconductivity above 77 K in hole-doped ${\mathrm{SrB}}{3}{\mathrm{C}}{3}$ (van Hove singularity, PRB)

  40. PhysRevB.105.245141 Spin-polarized sextuple excitations in ferromagnetic materials (PRB)

  41. PhysRevB.105.245142 Magnetic field induced topological transitions and thermal conductivity in a generalized Kitaev model (YBKim Kee,PRB)

  42. 2206.12122 Enhanced low-energy magnetic excitations evidencing the Cu-induced localization in an Fe-based superconductor Fe${0.98}$Te${0.5}$Se$_{0.5}$ (arXiv.org)

  43. 2206.12022 Traversing the pyrochlore stability diagram; microwave-assisted synthesis and discovery of mixed B-site Ln$_2$InSbO$_7$ family (arXiv.org)
